body:
I like this a lot better, but I still think this map is a bit of a disaster.

Spawn D (in the revised version) is particularly awful, with the bridges
choking off ore access. The mine below spawn H is also not good -- that
patch grows unusually slowly due to a lot of the random walks failing.

On Mon, Jul 25, 2016 at 9:34 PM, Jonas A. Lind notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Not happy about the ore patches. Will revise.
